title: Chocolate and peppermint crunch bars
ingredients: ['For the base', '250g margarine, melted', '100g desiccated coconut', '100g caster sugar', '20g cocoa powder', '170g corn flakes', '170g plain flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', 'For the topping', '275g icing sugar, sifted', '1/2 teaspoon peppermint extract', '150g dark cooking chocolate. melted']
